title: Recent lag increase
body:
Like many others, I seem to have had a noticeable decrease in stability ever since the recent patch/ client update.
My ping usually hovers around 33 and has been jumping as high as 200 for the past couple days. Just hit the thousands for the first time earlier today

Here're a few of my recent network logs:
https://gyazo.com/d671d8c2ec232f9238af6779148e1857
https://gyazo.com/742b5d1924222186e6c23754d4ae6ec8
https://gyazo.com/db87926f9963cad6787a1e0beac50b9b
https://gyazo.com/70343bee9e1ef04a655586b03507248e

-I use the Hextech repair tool so Lol should be clear with my firewall
-I'm using the recommended DNS and flushed
-I regularly play with as few background processes as possible
-I've repatched a few times
-I play on low spec mode and have the option to close the client during game enabled

replies.body:
From your logs, it looks like the main issue here is some packet loss. Even with it being around 4%, that can still be enough to make your ping spike up that high. It could be due to some oddly configured network settings, or your ISP might be having a few issues with how it's sending your connection to our servers. 

Let's get you in touch with our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that they can work their lvl 9 tech wizard magic!
